member.name: T:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.GoogleAuthenticationServer
member.summary: Class containing information about the Google OAuth2 authentication server.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.GoogleAuthenticationServer.Description
member.summary: Returns the description for the Google Authorization Server.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.DotNetOpenAuth.NativeApplicationClient
member.summary: The OAuth2 client for use by native applications. This is a partial implementation which should be used until the feature has been fully implemented in DotNetOpenAuth.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.DotNetOpenAuth.NativeApplicationClient.OutOfBandCallbackUrl
member.summary: Represents a callback URL which points to a special out of band page used for native OAuth2 authorization. This URL will cause the authorization code to appear in the title of the window.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.DotNetOpenAuth.NativeApplicationClient.#ctor(DotNetOpenAuth.OAuth2.AuthorizationServerDescription,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.DotNetOpenAuth.NativeApplicationClient.#ctor(System.Uri)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.DotNetOpenAuth.NativeApplicationClient.RequestUserAuthorization(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Creates the URL which should be used by the user to request the initial authorization. Uses the default Out-of-band-URI as a callback.
member.returns: URI pointing to the authorization server

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.DotNetOpenAuth.NativeApplicationClient.RequestUserAuthorization
member.summary: Creates the URL which should be used by the user to request the initial authorization. Uses the default Out-of-band-URI as a callback.
member.returns: URI pointing to the authorization server

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.DotNetOpenAuth.NativeApplicationClient.ProcessUserAuthorization(System.String,DotNetOpenAuth.OAuth2.IAuthorizationState)
member.summary: Uses the provided authorization code to create an authorization state.
member.param: The authorization code for getting an access token.
member.returns: The granted authorization, or null if the authorization was null or rejected.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.DotNetOpenAuth.NativeApplicationClient.ProcessUserAuthorization(System.String)
member.summary: Uses the provided authorization code to create an authorization state.
member.param: The authorization code for getting an access token.
member.returns: The granted authorization, or null if the authorization was null or rejected.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.OAuth2Authenticator`1
member.summary: Implements an OAuth2 authenticator using the DotNetOpenAuth library.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.OAuth2Authenticator`1.#ctor(`0,System.Func{`0,DotNetOpenAuth.OAuth2.IAuthorizationState})
member.param: The client which is used for requesting access and refresh tokens.
The method which provides the initial authorization for the provider.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.OAuth2Authenticator`1.LoadAccessToken
member.summary: Checks if an access token has been set. If this is not the case, this method will use the specified State provider to generate a new AuthorizationState.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.OAuth2Authenticator`1.State
member.summary: The current state of this authenticator

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Authentication.OAuth2.OAuth2Authenticator`1.NoCaching
member.summary: If this option is set to true, the authorization state will only last for a single request, and authorization will be re-requested for every additional request.
member.remarks: Will clear the current state if set to true. Can be used by Webserver-Applications to allow multiple AuthorizationStates/users.
